fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: If the head of government is a collective body, provide the gender of the person executing the most effective power over this body, or, if no such person exists, answer if any persons in the body are female.
fxInfo_question: What is the gender of the head of government?
fxInfo_sources: worldstatesmen.org; cf. Melander (2005); Paxton and Hughes (2007).
name: v2exfemhog
